document.full_text: paul simon strolled onstage at the pantages theater, and the crowd rose. standing-o without having played a note or said a word. yes, this hollywood crowd -- though decidedly graying -- was primed, and it was raucous and rolling all night.
document.title: paul simon takes graying fans on world tour
lines_and_colors: paul simon strolled onstage at the pantages theater, and the crowd rose. standing-o without having played a note or said a word. yes, this hollywood crowd -- though decidedly graying -- was primed, and it was raucous and rolling all night.
